name: My Super Cool RPG!!!
description:
So, this kid I know wanted to make a game, right? But he's new to programming, so I said "Why not use RPG Maker?" This is the result.

Featuring:

- An amazingly written plot not at all derived from a million other fantasy games!

- A ton of gameplay with totally original RPG content!

- Over 25 uses of the word "cool"!

- And not much more!

Disclaimer: This game was made for the Pompous Garbage Game Jam. lilTimmy46 is not a real person.
